title: ‘Where We Belong’ Review: A Performer Wonders, What’s in a Name?
description: In an autobiographical solo show at the Public Theater, Madeline Sayet grapples with her Indigenous ancestry and the responsibility that comes with her name.
dc:creator: Naveen Kumar

media:content.media:description: The writer and performer Madeline Sayet in “Where We Belong,” her solo show at the Public.
